num_channels.docs:
**, positive integer**: The number of audio channels to send to the output speaker. Either `1` or `2`. Defaults to the output speaker’s number of channels.

*See also: [Mixer Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/mixer.html#configuration-variables)*

output_speaker.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The [speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/index.html) to output the mixed audio.

*See also: [Mixer Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/mixer.html#configuration-variables)*

queue_mode.docs:
**, boolean**: Enables queue mode. If enabled, audio isn’t mixed but instead each source speaker’s audio is played successively, starting with the first listed source speaker.

*See also: [Mixer Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/mixer.html#configuration-variables)*

source_speakers.docs:
**, list**: A list of source speaker inputs. Must have at least 2 and at most 8 speakers.
  * **buffer_duration** (*Optional*, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)): The duration of the internal ring buffer. Larger values can reduce stuttering but use more memory. Defaults to `100ms`.
  
  * **timeout** (*Optional*, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)): How long to wait after finishing playback before releasing the bus. Set to `never` to never stop the speaker due to a timeout. Defaults to `500ms`.
  
  * All other options from [Speaker Component](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/index.html#config-speaker).
  
  

*See also: [Mixer Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/mixer.html#configuration-variables)*
